Content.Name: Room Reservations
Content.Title: Room Reservations
Content.BodyCopy:
Objective
To demonstrate how to reserve a room and specifiy the equipment needed on campus.

1. Go to www.byui.edu/eventservices.
2. Select "Scheduling Request."
3. Hoover over "My Account" and select "Login in" from the menu.
4. Enter your login information. 
5. Hover over "Reservations" and select an option. In this tutorial we will select "Room with Basic Set Up." 
6. Type date of event or click calendar icon.
7. Choose recurrence, if any.

Scheduling Options Available
Equipment Only - This option allows you to request a audio/visual equipment reservation and/or delivery to a classroom or office.

Event Request - This option allows you to submit a request for an event which may require a space reservation, audio/visual equipment, custodial setup, and support services (e.g. ticketing, ushering, parking, security, etc.)

Room Request Only - This option allows you to submit a request to reserve a classroom, conference room, chapel or lecture hall -- no additonal suport needed.

Room with Basic Set-up - This option allows you to submit a request to reserve a classroom, conference room, chapel or lecture hall, multipurpose/gym,  (rooms with the option of basic audio visual suppport only).

8. Specify times of event. 
9. Choose building. 
10. Submit number of attendants. 
11. Select any filters, which will narrow your search. 
12. Click on "Find Space."   
13. Click on the name of the room to see a preview.
14. Click on the plus sign located under "Request"
15. Click Continue. 
16. Enter needed information and click "Submit."
